ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Field Complete') && (NOT(ISBLANK( Incompletion_Reason__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Incompletion_Reason_Code__c ))) || NOT(ISBLANK( Incompletion_Code_1__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Incompletion_Code_2__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Incompletion_Code_3__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Incompletion_Code_4__c )) )
